Issue.description: Useful for a variety of reasons, but primarily this is useful in the case where a GRPC server sits behind a proxy. Most proxies have read/write timeouts on the front and backsides so if we have a long-lived GRCP connection with no traffic flowing the connection will be terminated by the proxy. Looking to implement something like https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/health-checking.md
